title: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the expected results should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Use the search option or dialog to search for declaration.
4. Notice that no results are displayed.
Expected: The search should display the expected results.
